name: Berliner Spielekiste
description: Berliner Spielekiste is a compilation of the first 500 editions of the PD disk series Spielekiste with overall about 900 games. Most files are compressed (dms) and need to be unpacked to a floppy before they can be used. The disc additionally contains a few utilities (e.g. one for the unpacking the files or anti virus tools) and tech demos.
